name: TorchDeals
overview:
Torchdeals offers deal vouchers on restaurants, spas and other services in the GTA. You can save 50 to 90% off of food and services, a great way to try a new place out for the first time.

We go to these businesses and meet the owners, chefs and staff. We sample the menus and services so we can bring you only the best deals at the best businesses. When TorchDeals runs a deal promotion – we’re putting our stamp of approval on the business and the deal.

Check out the deals every day on www.TorchDeals.com and to buy a voucher - simply click on the “Buy” button and make your purchase using your Visa, Mastercard or American Express credit card. An email will be sent to you confirming your purchase and shortly afterwards another email with your Voucher in html format.

Please print your voucher and bring it with you to redeem at the business.

You can also share these great deals with your friends using Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, email etc… And they make great gifts anytime of the year.
